content: Ethics in AI art involves respecting copyright laws, avoiding plagiarism, and being mindful of the potential impacts of your creations. Let's explore these aspects in more detail.

Copyright laws protect the rights of creators by giving them control over how their works are used. When using AI tools like MidJourney, it's important to ensure that the images and styles you create do not infringe on the rights of other artists.
Avoiding plagiarism means creating original content and giving proper credit when using inspiration from existing works. This builds your credibility and shows respect for the creative community.
Let's practice applying copyright principles in your AI art.

title: Understanding Copyright
instruction: Fill in the gap to ensure your work is original and does not infringe on the rights of other artists.

content: Now, let's practice creating original content and giving proper credit.

title: Avoiding Plagiarism
instruction: Fill in the gap to create original content and give proper credit to the source of inspiration.

content: Understanding and applying ethical guidelines will help you build a trustworthy brand. Clients and customers appreciate creators who respect copyright laws and produce original content.
Highlight your commitment to ethics in your portfolio and marketing materials. This will not only build trust but also attract clients who value integrity and originality.
Consistently adhering to ethical standards will help you build a reputation as a responsible and respected artist.
Congratulations! You've mastered the ethical considerations of using AI art. You've learned how to ensure your creations comply with copyright laws, avoid plagiarism, and build a trustworthy brand.
In the next lesson, we'll explore advanced Discord features for community engagement. Keep practicing and refining your skills!
